disp-quote.p: “ [Side effects] started from the day I started to take the PrEP pills. Sometimes I could even feel a headache. I could even feel dizzy and I would also feel sleepy. Sometimes I would take paracetamol to manage the headache, but as for now the headaches are now better. As for now if I take PrEP orally I will feel dizzy, so I will take the pills in the evening before I go to bed and I will feel dizzy and sleep. ”–Female, aged 21, in SDC (RUR02) (AAA)
